Breadth-First.Explanation: General observation of image elements without a hypothesis, collecting broad clues
Listing multiple possible locations (Monaco, Indonesia, Poland) and features, generating hypotheses

Depth-First.Explanation: Verifying a specific Monaco hypothesis by matching curve and grandstands
Depth-First.KeyElement: Curve and blue grandstands matching Rascasse corner

Depth-First.Explanation: Confirming exact viewpoint through photo comparisons of angle and building positions
Depth-First.KeyElement: Angle, grandstand layout, building positions, Citroën C3

Depth-First.Explanation: Cross-referencing maps and street views to confirm road curve and architecture
Depth-First.KeyElement: Maps/street view alignment and architectural match

Depth-First.Explanation: Consulting circuit maps to align road curvature, harbor proximity, and grandstand placement
Depth-First.KeyElement: Road curvature, harbor proximity, grandstand placement

Depth-First.Explanation: Synthesizing all visual elements to lock down Boulevard Albert 1er in Monaco
Depth-First.KeyElement: Correlation of curvature, harbor, grandstands, Citroën C3, buildings

Depth-First.Explanation: Detailed image analysis of car model and license plate as supporting evidence
Depth-First.KeyElement: Citroën C3 model and license plate

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Shift from broad hypothesis generation to detailed verification of a specific Monaco turn
